attributes.action: further investigate homophobic comments made by both Peter Robinson MP (First Minister of Northern Ireland) and Iris Robinson MP in relation to Article 9 of the Public Order (NI) Order 1987.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Despite over 100 complaints made to the PSNI in relation to article 9 of the Public Order Act, the continuous homophobic comments of Iris Robinson MP remain unchallenged.
To further this, Peter Robinson MP, First Minister for Northern Ireland, has publicly backed these comments. 
Whilst both MP's are entitled to their personal religious viewpoint, they should not be using their status in public office to flaunt the law.

The First Ministers views, and support of his colleagues views are contradictory to those set out in the below statement.
"OFMDFM is responsible for supporting Ministers and the institutions of government, building a programme for government and modernising government programme, promoting better community relations, a culture of equality and rights, and targeting social need and promoting social inclusion".

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Northern Ireland Executive or a matter for direct communication with the police as appropriate.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
